page.title: 03THE BA
page.content: The{Ba}is a game in which Orcadians compete against each other.The Ba which the men throw about is made of {leather}and inside it, is{cork. The Ba was first started by children kicking a ball in the Kirk Green, in the 1840's. After that men started kicking a ball in Broad Street. The Ba takes place at{Christmas}and {Newyear}every year. The two teams are called the{Uppies and the{Doonies.}If the Uppies won it was believed that there would be good {farming,}or if the Doonies won it would be a good year for{fishing. There is a men's Ba,a boy's Ba,but no longer a women's Ba because it was too rough and there was too much pulling hair,nipping and biting.
